ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Hunting spots
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the info Jon...I think I will go pay Lars and Cordelia a visit. MUAHAHAA!
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the info Jon...I think I will go pay Lars and Cordelia a visit.
MUAHAHAA!

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jon Blevins [mailto:jdblevins@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, November 15, 2000 10:33 AM
> To: EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com
> Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Hunting spots
>
>
> > I am currently level 20 and I am hunting Gorge
> > Hounds in EK. Are there any
> > suggestions as to where and what I should be hunting
> > to level somewhat
> > quickly. Speed is NOT of the essence, I guess I am
> > looking for a somewhat
> > safe yet efficient spot.
> >
>
> Couple places not often camped...
>
> 1) 19 shamen orc in Kithcor... zone from HH and turn
> to your right then run till you get to corner. I never
> died there, dont fear cause there are a few lower lvl
> orc near by that could kill you... Dark.. (make sure
> pets taunt it off) sic pet.. Dot... run... life tap...
> run (I ran backwards) along the wall till mob is dead.
> Dies realtivly guickly.
>
> 2) Lars McManuss is lvl 20 barb in WK kinda tough but
> if your carful you wont die.. wouldnt try unless you
> have atleast 150 int though. I like to turn pets
> tuant off... dark till it sticks... DOT and LT till
> dead with a fear thrown in on occasstion. Good new is
> a lot fo druids camp the area and with a sow i never
> once died :-)
>
> 3) Cordelia Minister in NK is very tough but do able
> but be prepared to zone a lot cuase on occasion you
> will pull a guard by accident. she is lvl 18-22
>
> 4) In Lesser Faydark there is a GREAT npc that is
> rarely camped. Forget the name. Very near the zone to
> Steamfont is some cottages. She is in the one to the
> far southwest. Very safe as the zone is right there, i
> got killed like 1 time in 2 lvls here i beleieve.
> belive mob to be 20-22 in lvl.
>
> Anyway.. theres a few places.
>
